titles.title: Get to a Yes or No Faster Act

To require the Director of the National Science Foundation to review the application process for awarding grants under the Small Business Innovation Research Program and the Small Business Technology Transfer Program.
Get to a Yes or No Faster Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Get to a Yes or No Faster Act
This bill directs the National Science Foundation to review the process for awarding grants under the Small Business Innovation Research Program and the Small Business Technology Transfer Program.
